Class DoubleBuffer

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.nd4j.linalg.api.buffer.DoubleBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DataBuffer

    public class DoubleBuffer
extends BaseDataBuffer
    Double buffer implementation of data buffer
